section.name: Toolkits
section.span: Get the right tools for your project.
section.p: Hippo ECM gives you freedom of choice regarding the technology you use to implement your 'front end'. A number of toolkits is available to make your life easier and speed up the implementation process.

subsection.name: Hippo Site Toolkit
subsection.p: The Hippo Site Toolkit is a set of components that enable rapid development of JSP based websites. Assemble your website by configuring templates, site map, navigation and URL space through a straightforward user interface, that integrates with Hippo CMS. Create a JSP based view layer using the provided tag library and expression language.

subsection.name: Hippo Portal
subsection.p: Hippo Portal integrates Hippo CMS with Jetspeed 2, the open source enterprise portal. Publish content to your portal from Hippo CMS. Let your users manage their own content through tight integration of Hippo CMS with your portal. Improve your organization's productivity using out-of-the-box CMS-backed collaboration functionality.
